FREE_TIER_PROMPTS.P0_Apple_Studio: Transform the photo into a high-end studio portrait in the style of Apple executive headshots. FREE_TIER_PROMPTS.P7_LowKey_BlackBG: Low-key studio portrait. Keep identity. Deep black background, controlled rim light, soft key with fast falloff. CONTROL_SUFFIX: Identity preservation is critical: maintain exact facial features, skin texture, and likeness of the original subject. Only modify clothing and setting as specified. The design board reference is for style guidance only - do not include the board in the output. Generate a single cohesive image. Photo-realistic rendering with professional photography quality. Natural lighting and textures throughout. --no distorted features, multiple images, design boards visible, artificial skin, color bleeding, warped anatomy
